selectCredentialPopup.nextButtonDisabledTitle: You need to select a Credential to proceed
selectCredentialPopup.previewDescription: You will be asked to select credentials that match the requirements below.

selectCredentialPopup.summaryDescription: You are about to share the selected credential(s) below, including only the requested fields.

tourGuide.tourComplete: Thank you for completing the tour, we hope it was helpful!
tourGuide.tourStep1: Here, you can view all your stored credentials. Click the 'Add New Credentials' card to get a new VC from an available Issuer
tourGuide.tourStep2: The 'Credentials' page is your Home page, where you can manage your credentials.
tourGuide.tourStep3: The 'Add Credentials' page allows you to receive credentials from a specific Issuer
tourGuide.tourStep4: Click this button to scan a QR code for sending or receiving credentials.
tourGuide.tourStep5: Use the 'Send Credentials' page to select a verifier for sharing your credentials.
tourGuide.tourStep6: On the 'History' page, you can view details of credential transmissions, including when and to which verifiers they were sent.
tourGuide.tourStep7: In the 'Settings' page you can manage your passkeys and account settings.

welcomeModal.description: Discover the $t(common.walletName) , your ultimate tool for managing digital credentials. Effortlessly view, get, present and keep track of all your credentials!
welcomeModal.question: Are you ready to explore the features of $t(common.walletName) through a guided tour?
welcomeModal.title: Welcome to $t(common.walletName)!
